channel.title: Super Spamm1.0 (First one, please help!)

item.title: Super Spamm1.0 (First one, please help!)
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////       Super Spamm 1.0       //////////////
/////////////      Made by Dharok Owns      //////////////
/////////////   First script, so errors!    //////////////
/////////////If one is found, please report //////////////
/////////////    to me by posting here!     //////////////
/////////////      Comes fully equiped      //////////////
/////////////       With some phrases!      //////////////
/////////////   (Most likely nooby script)  //////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////


program SuperSpamm;


var
sayit :integer;

const
Message1=('Selling ---- only ------gp!'); //Fill out what you are to sell and price
say=1;// how many times to say it
Rtime=3000; // random time for talking e.x. 3000

procedure Talk;
begin
  wait(5000+Random(Rtime))// (Milliseconds) (Set higher for more time inbetween speaking)
  SendKeys(Message1 + Chr(13)); //Change the message number to change the message
sayit:= say+1
end;

begin
 repeat
  Talk;
until(say=say)
if(say=say)then
writeln('script finished!');
end.

Fixed it nice and good for ya!
Just tiny errors after sendkeys(message1) put a + Chr(13))
After it and i put a var for how many times to say it.

item.title: Super Spamm1.0 (First one, please help!)
item.dc:creator: @Dharok_Owns Dharok Owns
item.description:
@Dharok_Owns wrote:

This is my first autotalker…

Could someone please tell me how to make this better and report somethings I should change?

Well here it is… ;D :eek: :o

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
///////////// Super Spamm 1.0 //////////////
///////////// Made by Dharok Owns //////////////
///////////// First script, so errors! //////////////
/////////////If one is found, please report //////////////
///////////// to me by posting here! //////////////
///////////// Comes fully equiped //////////////
///////////// With some phrases! //////////////
///////////// (Most likely nooby script) //////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program SuperSpamm;

const
Message1=‘Selling ---- only ------gp!’; //Fill out what you are to sell and price
Message2=‘Selling ---- at a deal of -----gp!’;
Message3=‘Buying ---- for -----gp! What a deal!’;
Message4=‘Buying ---- at an amazing deal of ----gp! What a deal!’;
Message5=‘Hi noobs!’;
Message6=‘Stop following me noob!’;
//Simply make a new line following the above to make a new phrase(add the ; also)
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure Talk;
begin
wait(5000) // (Milliseconds) (Set higher for more time inbetween speaking)
SendKeys(Message1); //Change the message number to change the message
end;

begin
repeat
Talk;
until(false)

end.
